PrecisAppointment of the firm of ROBINSON, LOTT and BROHMAN, of Guelph, Ontario, as auditor for the Canadian Turkey Marketing Agency, to audit its accounts and financial transactions for the fiscal periods ending December 31, 1999 and December 31, 2000.
